Text:
Panzer Elite Action: Dunes of War follows the story of two tank commanders and their crews through their harrowing North Africa battle campaigns. Features two new different campaigns including Germans and Allies. Become the leader of your own squad and give lots of different commands. The fast paced, action packed game puts you right into the battlefield filled with dozens of AI controlled airplanes, anti tank cannons, infantry and enemy vehicles. Feel the power of 30 tons of steel armour around you as you crush through the destructible environment, mowing down trees and destroying entire buildings. 10 new Multiplayer maps with different environment and style. Popular "Conquest" and "Capture the Flag" style multiplayer mode for up to 32 players.


Extract Archive To Any Desired Directory With Winrar Or 7zip etc.........


NO INSTALL JUST EXTRACT AND PLAY 

Start Game With "pea.exe" 


ENJOY AND PLEASE SEED
Game doesnt work. You click on new game and it loads. This guy starts talking about your mission and then the screen goes black. I can hear the tank engin and the sounds but no screen.

Thanks for posting the game however there is some kind of problem... I had the same issue as the other user however I installed the DirectX packadge that is included which allowed me to make it into the first mission.... but after like 30 seconds there is some error posted and then it asks us to send an error report and then it crashes - it doesnt give enough time to read the reason but I think it said somthing about a profile. anyways Please, please, please help us I really want to play this :)

again, thanks for posting
